name: Astrolyte: Missile Defender
description:
Astrolyte: Missile Defender guarantees authentic arcade shoot 'em up action, where you will take it upon yourself to defend a secret military base deep in the desert against invading alien forces! You and your trusty missile launcher must see the UFOs blown to bits within a time limit, whilst racking up the highest score possible for the online leaderboards.

Featuring custom sound effects and music, as well as an online leaderboard and lots of other features, the making of this arcade action one man project took weeks of time to program and develop.

Clicking with your mouse has never been this intense. Prepare to lock and load!
